Description: Wall sherd of East Greek (North Ionian?) Middle Wild Goat II pottery large closed vessel; light brown clay with some white inclusions; interior reserved; exterior, wirn cream slip; part of a grazing wild goat to right; filling ornaments: rosette, quatrefoil, roundel; broad band below with added red band lined in white.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.877)
